title: Can't Play LoL
body: Whenever I try to log in so I can play LoL, it gets stuck in authenticating mode for a while then once it finally stops it says "An unexpected error occurred while logging in. Please try again. If this issue persists, contact support at support.riotgames.com" Its been 3 days since I've been able to play and although I've visited the website given nothing seems to help. I've tried using the Hextech Repair Tool and reinstalling LoL but I always get this message. Thanks.

replies.body: It sounds like your network is failing to reach the authentication servers, so it can't receive your credentials to login.  You should go over the steps of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this towards a fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!
yea same here man. they discourage it but I'm using a vpn to try n see if it works. last resort I couldn't find a fix :(
